rules_text:
Whenever an artifact you control enters, target player mills two cards.
[i]Fusion Art[/i] – {5}{U}{U}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Return up to three target artifact cards from your graveyard to your hand. If {G} was spent, return up to three target cards from your graveyard to your hand instead.
notes: 2.2.1: Changed the fusion art to be a big ol’ activated ability that wins you the game. Seems like a lot more fun for both decks without helping dimir turbo mill hopefully.
